metadata.title: CVE-2021-33515 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The submission service in Dovecot before 2.3.15 allows STARTTLS command injection in lib-smtp. Sensitive information can be redirected to an attacker-controlled address.

advisory.discovered_by: Fabian Ising and Damian Poddebniak of MÃ¼nster University of Applied Sciences

criterions.comment: dovecot package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.1').
